Title: 41000 - # Reasons Offering Online Payments Can Help the Finances of Your Small Business
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 reasons that offering an online payment option to customers would be financially beneficial to small businesses. You can discuss things such as the ease and convenience of having customers pay online, and how this will aid in getting their invoices paid in full and on time. You can also mention the speed of online payments, versus having to wait for a check to come in the mail. Be sure to highlight the financial benefits of online payments, as the placement site discusses finances, success strategies, the economy, and more. Your target audience is small business owners who are interested in taking control of their business’s finances in an efficient and cost effective way. You can link to your target URL by mentioning Bill Pro as an online merchant, capable of helping you with your online payment needs.

Title: 41001 - # Benefits of Accepting Multiple Forms of Payment as a Business Owner
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 benefits of offering multiple forms of payment as a business owner. By giving customers or clients the option of paying online or by phone, business owners open themselves up to more clients and are able to get their money in the most efficient and convenient way possible. Customers and clients are more likely to pay in full and on time, when they have more options other than just cash or check. Your placement site gives information and advice on business, finance, employment and more, so be sure to write for your target audience of business owners. You can link to the target URL by mentioning that Bill Pro can help business owners set up online bill pay as well as bill pay by phone.

Title: 41002 - # Things All Online Business Owners Should Consider
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different things that all online business owners need to consider, when trying to run a successful online business. You can focus on ideas for more effectively and efficiently managing their businesses and their finances. Discuss things such as online bill-pay options, cloud computing, customer service, marketing techniques, etc. Your target audience is entrepreneurs, so be sure cover a wide range of business and financial management topics. You can link to your target URL when discussing online bill-pay. Bill Pro offers help with online payments, online shopping carts, and even the option of offering transactions in customer’s local currency.
